chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.warning: THIS DOCUMENT IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT!
chapter.para: Source MUD is a MUD (Multi-User Dungeon) game server. Players connect to the server using telnet, or a MUD client application, to play in a fantasy world with other players.

Source MUD is a new codebase; it is not derived from any older codebases like many other popular MUDs. One consequence of this is that many terms and systems found in most other MUDs are different in Source MUD.
